content: Birth and Reign of the Prince of Peace

But there will be no  gloom for her who was in anguish [for with judgment comes the promise of salvation]. In earlier times He treated the land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali with contempt, but later on He will make them honored [by the presence of the Messiah], by the way of the sea, on the other side of Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles.
The Lord sends a word (message) against Jacob,
And it falls on Israel [the ten northern tribes, the kingdom of Ephraim].
And all the people know it,
, Ephraim and the inhabitants of Samaria [its capital],
Who say in pride and arrogance of heart:
But we will rebuild [all the better] with ashlar (hewed stones);
The sycamores have been cut down,
But we will replace them with [expensive] cedars.”
Therefore the  raises against Ephraim adversaries from Rezin [king of Aram]
The Arameans on the east and the Philistines on the west;
And they devour Israel with gaping jaws.
In  all this, God’s anger does not turn away
But His hand is still stretched out [in judgment].
